Title: Crowdsourcing
Description:
Light's Gambit is an old and honored game. There's a reason so many Arathi play it! 

It can teach you a lot about strategy. And it can tell you a lot about your opponents. 

<Faerin suddenly deflates.> 

But we're still missing a few pieces that we need in order to play.

Sometimes, folks around Mereldar lend us pieces for a game. Could you ask around?
ObjectivesText: Collect 4 Game Pieces from Arathi in Mereldar.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Find Faerin and Anduin on the third floor of the Lamplighter Headquarters.
CompletionText: The rules are a bit lengthy but trust me... it's worth it!
RewardText: We... might have gotten a bit ahead of ourselves.
